page.title: 08HOUSES IN THE WARDOUR AREA
page.content: We drove along every road of our area and did a survey of all the houses Most were old,but a few were new. We went through{Tisbury}especially to see some modern houses that were being built.If we had done this survey two years ago they would not have existed, so they're shown{blue.}Most of the old houses were made of{stone,}and many of them were{thatched.}Many of the really modern ones were made of{brownish {reddish brick. { Laura 70 ** { Jennifer 60 ********** {Claire }********* 50 ********** { ********** 40 ********** {********** 30 ********** {********** 20 ********** ****** {********** 10 ********** **********{********** 0 Over 100 25 - 100 Under 25 years old years old years old
